name: YOGO Burger
description:
Please Note: All donations for my games go directly to support the Technology Cooperative, a 501c3 nonprofit organization founded to create a technology-focused community that provides computer-related technology access and awareness.

"It's your first day at YoGo Burger, and management has said it needs to make some cuts. Effectively immediately all customers can have only one item on a burger. Marketing suggests we do not tell customers of this new policy, and research shows people only care about one topping anyway so there should be no complaints.

Also, new policy for new hires: get one complaint and you're fired!"

This game was created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare #28 under the theme "you only get one". I admit this game isn't very good or fun, but as it developed I went with it in a "Papers Please" style of depressing play! It is also the first game where I made the art myself (tried more like it).

The music for the game is available on Soundcloud.

If you would like to read more about the game's development, I've written a postmortem on my blog.
